entry.title: My man FKA Based Potato has it right me thinks. Everything flows from the 🌽. All hail the king.
entry.summary:
My man FKA Based Potato has it right me thinks. Everything flows from the 🌽. All hail the king.
0xpotato: @DeFiSurfer808 my perspective as w all comments re stables / onchain activity is that value flows in 1 direction BTC/ETH pump ---> Onchain activity rises --> Leverage/OI rises ---> Stablecoin minting volume rises thats how it works it doesnt flow the other way. Its an effect not a cause.

entry.summary: RT Multichain (Previously Anyswap) The lockup assets on the Multichain MPC address have been moved to an unknown address abnormally. 8848 社区（8848 Community）: 时间飞逝，#币安 已经陪伴大家6年了。还记得当初认购的BNB可惜没拿住😭。6年很长又很短，我们还有更多个6年去探索 #Web3 的更多可能。 Let's build together！ 关注@8848Community 和 @binancezh 6.29晚上随机抽取3套6周年礼包 活动指路参与@binancezh 置顶活动赢️迪拜名额，更有机会与CZ面对面
